entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Ucluelet
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:44 PM PST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 2.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of flurries near Zeballos and Tahsis in the afternoon. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Thursday 23 February 2023
